name: Filipe Rodrigues
title: Mobile and Backend Developer
about: Hello! I'm Filipe Rodrigues. I love to build tricky and complex UI's for your Mobile apps. Give me visual challenges and I'll be a happy camper. I've got experience as a Mobile and FullStack Developer. Knowing both fields helps me to see problems with unique perspective. Over the years I have developed and launched many Mobile apps to the App Store.
